org.modelio.gproject.module.catalog

Class FileModuleStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.gproject.module.catalog.FileModuleStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModuleCatalog

    public class FileModuleStore
extends Object
implements IModuleCatalog
    Modules storage structure based on directories and files typically used to cache or to catalog module data, and avoid extracting/reading them over and over.

    Needs a writable directory to store unzipped .jmdacs into.

    For now, modules are stored in the cache as a directory $(jmdac name)/$(jmdac hashcode).

                                String moduleVersion,
                                IModelioProgress monitor)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: IModuleCatalog
        Get a module handle from the cache.
        Specified by:
        findModule in interface IModuleCatalog
        Parameters:
        moduleName - the module to find.
        moduleVersion - the version of the module to find. Might be null to indicate the latest available version.
        monitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.
        Returns:
        the module handle
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure
        FileSystemException - in case of file system error. Use FileUtils.getLocalizedMessage(FileSystemException) to get a human readable error message.

      • copy

        public IModuleHandle copy(IModuleHandle handle,
                          FileModuleStore destStore,
                          IModelioProgress monitor)
                   throws FileSystemException,
                          IOException
        Copy the module handle datas into the given catalog directory and return a module handle using a sub directory of the given catalog directory.

        Does nothing if the module has already been copied once in the destination catalog.

        Parameters:
        handle - the module handle to copy.
        destStore - the catalog directory where datas should be copied.
        monitor - the progress monitor to use for reporting progress to the user. It is the caller's responsibility to call done() on the given monitor. Accepts null, indicating that no progress should be reported and that the operation cannot be cancelled.
        Returns:
        a module handle using a sub directory of the new directory.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of other failure
        FileSystemException - in case of file system error. Use FileUtils.getLocalizedMessage(FileSystemException) to get a human readable message.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Path jmdacPath)
                 throws IOException
        Tells whether the given .jmdac file is already contained in this catalog.
        Parameters:
        jmdacPath - a jmdac archive
        Returns:
        true only if the module is already contained in this catalog.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of I/O error.
